short_summary: Office furniture purchase for RCMP in Miramichi, NB
description: Purchase and installation of office furniture to Miramichi, New-Brunswick by January 29, 2024.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal - Office Furniture

**Title:** EB129-240791 - Office Furniture, RCMP - Miramichi, NB

**Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites submissions for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) location in Miramichi, New Brunswick.

**Contract Details:**

| Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4261395662 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-11-17T14:00:00 |
| Publication Date | 2023-10-25 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-11-18 |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |

**Summary:**
The RCMP seeks a contractor to supply and install office furniture, including:

* Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
* Freestanding height adjustable desk/table products
* Metal filing and storage cabinets
* Ancillary and lighting products
* Support space and collaborative furniture

**Eligibility:**
Suppliers must be pre-qualified and hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C to bid on the contract. Non-Supply Arrangement holders may submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority for evaluation.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
* LeBlanc, Kristelle (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17824827?extsite=MTc4MjQ4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17824827?extsite=MTc4MjQ4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Attachments:** None

This rewritten text maintains the essential information from the original entry, but presents it in a clear and concise manner. Some of the key changes include:

* Reformatting the text to improve readability
* Consolidating repetitive information
* Using bullet points and tables to present contract details
* Emphasizing essential information, such as eligibility requirements and contact details
* Simplifying sentence
